scripts.podman:build:authoring: yarn run run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build --tag dashbuilder-authoring:0.0.0 -f dashbuilder-authoring/Dockerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
scripts.podman:build:runtime: yarn run run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build --tag dashbuilder-runtime:0.0.0 -f dashbuilder-runtime/Dockerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
scripts.build:prod: yarn cleanup && yarn copy:assets && yarn podman:build:runtime && yarn podman:build:authoring
